text: Give a Girl a Break is a 1953 American musical comedy movie directed by Stanley Donen and starring Marge Champion, Gower Champion, Debbie Reynolds, Bob Fosse, Richard Anderson, Larry Keating. It was distributed by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1953 comedy movies Category:1953 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Stanley Donen
title: Give a Girl a Break
